summary: Adds an item what functions like a spell book that adds the ability 'Heart of the Atronatch".
descriptionHtml:
Adds a console summon-able item that gives the ability "Heart of the Atronatch".

The ability gives 100% magicka absorb and -500% magicka regen to attempt to balance it out.

This is similar to what can be done in game with the right combination of perks and/or potions & the atronatch standing stone.

To get the item that gives the ability open the console and type:

Help atronatch

The item you want, if you have nothing else using the name heart of the atronatch, is the book.

The spell is whats given by the book and can possibly be added by a different console command.

now type into the console:

Player.additem [ID code for book found using help atronatch] 1

Now simply attempt to read the page to get the ability.
author: HuntsInShadow

files.name: Heart of the Atronatch Ability Book
